description: Holy Bits: A Guide for Using Computers in Biblical Scholarship. As a supplement to the book "Holy Bits. A Guide for Using Computer in Biblical Scholarship", this homepage wants to give you up-to-date information. For easy access, there is not much text. Primarily the goal of this page is to provide up-to-date weblinks and some information and tips in keyword style. MVC Hardware Operating Systems Standards Security Text Processors Presentations Biblio Software Bible Software Utilities (extra)Biblical Texts Books and Journals Bibliographies Thematic Resources Websites of Interest BiblioBlogs Contact Impressum.
title: Using Computers in Biblical Scholarship
